feed.title: xBackBone Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for xBackBone: XBackBone 3.6.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make AuthController.php compatible with php8.1+ by @nebulade in https://github.com/SergiX44/XBackBone/pull/532

New Contributors

  • @nebulade made their first contribution in https://github.com/SergiX44/XBackBone/pull/532

Full Changelog: https://github.com/SergiX44/XBackBone/compare/3.6.2...3.6.3

entry.title: New release for xBackBone: XBackBone 3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [UploadController] Response now includes a raw_url field by @cursey in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/533
  • Support For Vanity Urls by @SrS2225a in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/507
  • LDAP fixes by @samrzhevsky in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/547
  • Add support for kde integration by @SrS2225a in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/554
  • Bump aws/aws-sdk-php from 3.271.3 to 3.294.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/556
  • Add link to file preview which opens the file itself by @lsgd in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/553

New Contributors

  • @cursey made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/533
  • @SrS2225a made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/507
  • @lsgd made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/553

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/compare/3.6.3...3.7.0

entry.title: New release for xBackBone: XBackBone 3.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enable upload from clipboard by @lsgd in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/572
  • Fix page count calculation by @samrzhevsky in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/586
  • Add optional code param in upload request by @nickhnsn in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/588
  • Exporting ShareX Settings Fix by @SenkaWolf in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/617
  • Add an app_email option to the config by @Mainfrezzer in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/616

New Contributors

  • @nickhnsn made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/588
  • @SenkaWolf made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/617
  • @Mainfrezzer made their first contribution in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/616

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/compare/3.7.0...3.8.0

entry.title: New release for xBackBone: XBackBone 3.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • FIX ArgumentCountError in UploadController::saveMedia by @The-MEO in https://github.com/sergix44/XBackBone/pull/625

New Contributors
